lines.text: How are all your lunies, Aaron?

[Dryly]
Oh, they're still crazy, or at least I hope so.
What about that Grade A milk of human kindness?
Well. it has been known to sour.
You've got the meanest look I've ever seen in a human eye.

[to Minnie]
Well, do we look like the kind of people who might be up to monkeyshines?
